title: Download replays not working
body:
Download replays not working.. it keep downloading forever.. how to fix this? any solution?

i wait for 30 min and still downloading

replies.body: This could either be a a permissions setting blocking the replay from saving to your documents folder.  Double check your folder to see if any are being saved at all:  C:\Users\\Documents\LeagueofLegends.  Try the steps in our [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide as well to make sure your pc is allowing game files to download and save.  I hope that helps!

it fix it self when um.. its hard to explain 

so.. when i just que solo rank with my friend, right when in champ select i got bug splat.. and then, of course i try to relog. what happen is, when i relog, my client revert to elementalist login screen. it let me patch about 1.1 gb and my client back to normal. but it happen again after 2 days (the revert login screen into lux elementalis). now my client is back to normal , i don't know if that bug will occur again.


thanks for reply tho..
